definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The utility of this rescue equipment has still to be assessed in a real emergency.
sentences.chinese: 這種救生設備的功用還有待在真正的緊急情況中評定。

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用彎曲強度及撓度評定鋼鋸條抗彎曲斷裂的能力。

sentences.english: At the 6th month of treatment, the complications and prognosis of patients in all groups were evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 並於6個月對各組患者的併發症及預後進行評定。

sentences.english: The outcomes were assessed by Jia's clinical criteria.
sentences.chinese: 採用賈連順的療效評定法評定臨牀結果。

sentences.english: The outcomes were assessed by Jia's clinical criteria.
sentences.chinese: 採用賈連順的療效評定法評定臨牀結果。

sentences.english: In fact, why do we rate him?
sentences.chinese: 事實上，爲什麼我們去評定他？

sentences.english: Verification of wound in scoring scale.
sentences.chinese: 評分表評定傷情的驗證。

sentences.english: Leg-length discrepancy was assessed clinically and radiographically when needed.
sentences.chinese: 在需要時，從臨牀上和影象學上對肢體長度進行評定。

sentences.english: This principle can be extended to other angularity error evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 文中的評定原理可擴展到其他傾斜度誤差的評定。

sentences.english: This principle can be extended to other angularity error evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 文中的評定原理可擴展到其他傾斜度誤差的評定。

sentences.english: These morphs were then rated for attractiveness by 77 heterosexual male students.
sentences.chinese: 然後，77名異性戀男生對這些變體評定吸引力情況。

sentences.english: The court ordered the costs to be taxed if not agreed.
sentences.chinese: 法院命令如果達不成協議訴訟費用由法院評定。

sentences.english: Objective The malignant bone tumor patients after assessment of the psychological changes.
sentences.chinese: 目的對惡性骨腫瘤患者術後的心理變化進行評定。

sentences.english: Submit assessment report or certification for propriety made fire damper installation method.
sentences.chinese: 遞交評定報告或證書關於專利廠防火閘的安裝方法。

sentences.english: It is to evaluate the uncertainty in measurement of methanol concentration in distilled liquor.
sentences.chinese: 評定蒸餾酒中甲醇濃度的不確定度。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into the assessment on sexual self-defense ability in forensic psychiatric assessment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討性自我防衛能力在司法鑑定中的評定。

definition: to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
to guard a pass/to check on sth
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
